data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lucena, Daercio A. A., Kimsey, Lynn S., Almeida, Eduardo A. B. (2016): The Neotropical cuckoo wasp genus Ipsiura Linsenmaier, 1959 (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae): revision of the species occurring in Brazil. Zootaxa 4165 (1): 1-71, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4165.1.1|437 occurrences
